item.description:
4pm and evening tethered hot air balloon rides $10 (weather permitting). Free music: Sweetwind, Celtic acoustic folk rock at 4:30. The Crescents showtime rock 'n roll band at 5:45. Bring a picnic or money for club food and drinks. Click here for directions and details: http://www.ledgesgc.c...
http://www.myspace.co...
http://www.thecrescen...
We'll gather in the lobby area for 10 minutes, then go check out the balloons? If it's rainy we'll eat, drink and be merry where the music is...the tent area.
item.how_to_find_us: New clubhouse opening up. I'll be inside by the door area when you first come in, looking for you (RSVP with photo?). I'll try to save seats/table but that's iffy. Friends, if you can't be there at 4:00, hope to see you later..you have my mug shot :)
item.why: You will love it because doesn't everyone like hot air balloons and dance music?
item.name: Music & Hot Air Ballooning
